incidents.name: Elevated 500 Errors in Multiple Twilio Products

incident_updates.body: All Intelligence and Transcriptions that were recoverable have been recovered. Programmable Voice Recording and Intelligence services are operating normally at this time.

Engineers have recovered all recordings that were impacted by the incident (those from approximately 7:00 AM PT to 9:31 AM PT on 5 October 2023) and able to be recovered. Intelligence and Transcriptions have been partially recovered and engineers continue working to ensure all impacted requests have been recovered. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Intelligence and Transcriptions have been partially recovered and engineers continue working to ensure all impacted requests have been recovered. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Engineers have recovered nearly all recordings that were impacted by the incident (those from approximately 7:00 AM PT to 9:31 AM PT on 5 October 2023). Intelligence and Transcriptions have been partially recovered and engineers are still working to ensure all impacted requests have been recovered. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Engineers are still investigating impact to recordings & transcriptions during the impact window from the incident on October 5th, approximately between 7:00 AM PT to 9:31 AM PT. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
